	body {
		background-color: #114e7b;
	}
	h1 {
		font-size: 30px;
	}
	#content, #footer {
		width: 800px;
		margin: auto;
		background-color: #fff;
		border-radius: 4px; /* Added by border radius plugin */
		border: solid 1px #ccc;
		padding: 5px;
		-moz-border-radius: 4px; /* Added by border radius plugin */
		-webkit-border-radius: 4px; /* Added by border radius plugin */
		-khtml-border-radius: 4px; /* Added by border radius plugin */
	}
	#links {
		float: right;
		padding-left: 15px;
		text-align: vertical;
	}
	#header {
		padding: 10px;
	}
	#roundbox {
		border-radius: 4px; /* Added by border radius plugin */
		border: solid 1px;
		background-color: #fff;
		padding: 5px;
		-moz-border-radius: 4px; /* Added by border radius plugin */
		-webkit-border-radius: 4px; /* Added by border radius plugin */
		-khtml-border-radius: 4px; /* Added by border radius plugin */
	}
	#wrapper {
		width: 700px;
		margin: 0 auto;
	}
	#topbar {
		width: 100%;
		background: #fff;
	}
	#main {
		width: 800px;
	}
	#main ul {
		margin: 0;
		float: right;
	}
	#main li {
		display: inline;
		margin: 0;
		float: right;
	}

	}
}
